revised_title: Awards and Achievements in Science: Royal Society Honorees of 1970
tldr: The article highlights the accomplishments of various scientists who were awarded medals by the Royal Society in 1970. These honorees made significant contributions to fields such as biology, chemistry, physics, engineering, earth sciences, medicine, and mathematics. Their achievements include advancements in nucleic acid research, engineering and development of nuclear energy, and studies on vision and color vision.
